t: Mavi brand jeans are my new favorite! I have been buying Silver brand and Lucky ...
s: Mavi brand jeans are my new favorite! I have been buying Silver brand and Lucky brand jeans for years, but stumbled upon Mavi jeans in a little store in Las Vegas last month. These jeans have a great feel to them, and are made a denim that has a little give to it for a relaxed feel.
